definitions.dating_raw: First attested sometime between the mid 16 century and the early 17 century.

definitions.definition: Straying from the right way; deviating from morality or truth.
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the mid 18 century.

definitions.definition: Deviating from the ordinary or natural type; exceptional ; abnormal .
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the mid 19 century.

main_definition: Differing from the norm . [First attested sometime between the mid 16 century and the early 17 century.]
secondary_definitions: ( sometimes figuratively ) Straying from the right way; deviating from morality or truth. [First attested in the mid 18 century.]
( botany , zoology ) Deviating from the ordinary or natural type; exceptional ; abnormal . [First attested in the mid 19 century.]
